Formula: (Number of days a student attended school/number of school days a student is enrolled) X 100

Variable Description: Five year percent change -- attendance rate (2010-11 to 2014-15 school year)
Formula: ((Attendance rate in 2014-2015 school year - Attendance rate in 2010-2011 school year) / Attendance rate in 2010-2011 school year) X 100
